title: Reideen the Superior - Chouja Raideen
alternative_title: Chouja Reideen, Choja Raideen, Reideen the Superior, 超者ライディーン
description: Hishou, Ginga, Ace, Hayate, and Ikazuchi all work at a studio doing various idol-related jobs at the request of their manager, Reiko. But in reality, these five teenagers are actually the Reideens, a group of superheroes who fight the Super Devils sent by Lushu, a mysterious being. Little do the Reideens know, these Super Devils are being sent for a more important purpose...Source: ANN
